scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:all: concurrently -n backend,frontend,tracking -c blue,green,yellow "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:tracking"
scripts.install:all: npm --prefix backend install && npm --prefix frontend install
scripts.build: npm --prefix backend run build && npm --prefix frontend run build
